<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <metadata>

        <general>

            <catalog>SDT</catalog>

          <title>
            <string language="hu">A kén</string>
            <string language="en">The sulphur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Schwefel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le soufre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O enxôfre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo zolfo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το θείο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sulfuro</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A kén módosulatai</string>
            <string language="en">Alterations of sulphur</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">monoklin,  rombos,  monoklin kén,  rombos kén,  amorf,  amorf módosulat,  </string>
            <string language="en">monoclinic, orthorhombic, monoclinic sulphur, rthorhombic sulphur, amorphous, plastic sulphur</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Änderungen des Schwefels</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changements de soufre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alterações do enxôfre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alterazioni di zolfo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροποποιήσεις του θείου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alteraciones del sulfuro</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">monoclinic, orthorhombic, monoclinic Schwefel, 
rthorhombic Schwefel, formloser, Plastikschwefel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">soufre monoclinique, orthorhombic, monoclinique, soufre
rthorhombic, soufre amorphe et en plastique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">enxôfre monoclinic, orthorhombic, monoclinic, enxôfre

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">zolfo monoclinic, orthorhombic, monoclinic, zolfo

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονοκλινικό, ορθορομβικό, μονοκλινικό θείο, rthorhombic 
θείο, άμορφο, πλαστικό θείο</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sulfuro monoclinic, orthorhombic, monoclinic, sulfuro

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
